title: Animation pie
brief_description: A group of high school students go through the processes and experiences of making several animated films. Covers the techniques of flip books, drawing on film, pixilation, cut-outs and clay animation.
description: A group of high school students go through the processes and experiences of making several animated films. Covers the techniques of flip books, drawing on film, pixilation, cut-outs and clay animation.
